definitions.definition: A course or way which is traveled or passed.
definitions.example: The route was used so much that it formed a rut.

definitions.definition: A regular itinerary of stops, or the path followed between these stops, such as for delivery or passenger transportation.
definitions.example: Here is a map of our delivery routes.

definitions.definition: A road or path; often specifically a highway.
One of multiple methods or approaches to doing something.
One of the major provinces of imperial China from the Later Jin to the Song, corresponding to the Tang and early Yuan circuits.
A specific entry in a router that tells the router how to transmit the data it receives.
To direct or divert along a particular course.
definitions.example: All incoming mail was routed through a single office.

definitions.definition: To connect two local area networks, thereby forming an internet.
